name: Justin

topics.response_text: I thought I knew everyone in the Family, but I don't recognize you. You must be one of Vance's new initiates.

topics.topic_text: He's needed at home. His family is dead.
topics.response_text: Yes, I know. He told me.

topics.topic_text: I'm not here to take sides, just to make sure Vance hasn't omitted any facts.
topics.response_text: I'd never thought of it that way. I suppose he should get a chance to talk to someone like you.

topics.topic_text: He needs to talk to someone from the outside, to get some perspective.
topics.response_text: I'd never thought of it that way. I suppose he should get a chance to talk to someone like you.
How do you know that? If you've spoken to him like I have, I think you can see he's truly one of us.

topics.topic_text: Please, help me understand your Laws.
topics.response_text: Well, Vance makes each of us remember a rule, and when we all gather in the common area, we have to say it out loud. Kinda weird.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for Ian West. Have you seen him?
topics.response_text: Ian? What do you want from him?
Well, Vance told me that this place was called Meresti. It was named aftersome townway across the ocean in a place calledRomania.
It's a great way to get back at those assholes out there who think we're losers.
It's outsider's perspectives that drove him here in the first place.

conversation.response_text: I've never seen you around here before.
Cool! I knew you'd get the hang of it. Good job, Alan!
I don't think so. He still seems pretty out of it, but considering what happened...

description:
Justin is a 19 year-old Caucasian Male.

A young member of The Family who serves as a caretaker for Ian West. Justin is deeply devoted to Vance and his teachings, having been saved by him from an Enclave patrol at age 14.

Justin's Personality: Eager, headstrong, and friendly to those he doesn't perceive as a threat. Justin is a true believer in Vance's vampire stories and passionately preaches them to other Family members. He forms strong emotional bonds quickly, particularly with Ian West.

Justin's Backstory: Born in the wasteland, Justin's early life was marked by hardship and danger. At age 14, he was captured by Enclave patrols near Rivet City and subjected to brutal treatment by the city guards. It was Vance who rescued him from this fate and brought him into The Family. Since joining, Justin has become one of Vance's most devoted followers, embracing the vampire mythology that Vance has built around their existence. He now serves as a caretaker for Ian West, a newer member of The Family, and has formed a deep emotional bond with him.
